short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One password to rule them all. Creates strong passwords with a combination of a master password and a phrase/url.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of making or remembering different passwords for your accounts? 
With Password Creator all you need is one password. Using a combination of a master password and a phrase, it creates a strong password with chosen length and character set.
